tips: Up to a maximum of 12 entries can be created - any additional entries will be ignored. Bad/non-functioning elements still count towards the 12 if they are enabled.
The dimensions parameter follows the structure of [x,y,w,h] without the brackets. X and Y are 0-indexed.
Two special classes called [version] and [resources] exist. Specifying an entry with one of the two classes will enable unique features.
Each special class may only be instanced once. The first entry that specifies itself of the class is given precedence.
The [Execution] parameter follows the same syntax as a Rainmeter bang. The brackets must be omitted.
If replicating a Rainmeter bang, only one bang is permitted with the start/end brackets omitted. If you need more than 1 Bang for your Path, it is probably unsuited for this environment.
Button Image assets will treat @Resources\assets\largebuttons as its root directory. Store any image assets you would like to use in that folder.
